definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: He was leather, head to toe---one of those guys.
sentences.chinese: 他以前是個從頭到腳都穿着皮製品的傢伙。

sentences.english: We are going to present the full line of our leather products. At Guangzhou Fair in autumn this year.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在今年秋季的廣交會上展出各式各樣的皮製品。
